verses.1: Thubul hoih khat tawh ka lungsim hong dimletin, kumpipa la ka phuah a, ka leii pen lai thei paʼ laikung tawh hong kibang hi.
verses.2: Mihingte lakah nangmah na hoih pen a, thugen na siam a, na kam khum zungzung hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in nang thupha hong pia tawntung hi.
verses.3: Vanglian kumpipa aw, na minthanna le na liatna tawh na namsau kuah in.
verses.4: Thumanna a om nading le thuman a hu dingin na minliatna tawh gualzo-in hong pusuak inla, dipkuathuai hihnate na taklam khut nangmah kihilhsak in.
verses.5: Kumpipaʼ galteʼ lungtang ah na thaltang hiamte lut a, mite na nuai ah puk uh hi.
verses.6: Na kumpi tokhom siangtho kip tawntung hi. Na kumpi ciangkhut thumanna ciangkhut hi a,
verses.7: thuman deihin gitlohna na mudah hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian ahi, nangma Pasian in na khangualte tungah a kikhai to-in lungdamna sathau nang hong nilh zo a,
verses.8: na puan tualpite myrrh paknamtui, aloes paknamtui, le thalsing namtuite a nam hi. Saiha tawh kibawl innpite panin khausai lasaknate in nang hong lungdamsak a,
verses.9: kumpiteʼ tanute, numei uliante lakah om a, na tak lamah Ofir gam khamte tawh kizemin kumpinu a ding hi.
verses.10: Tanu aw, ngai dih in; ngaihsun inla, na bil hong ngat in. Na mite le na behte mangngilh in.
verses.11: Na melhoihna hangin kumpipa in hong deih ding hi. Na topa ahih ciangin ama mai ah kun in.
verses.12: Mihau pen ahi Taia mite in na manpha namkim letsong tawh nang hong maivil ding uh hi.
verses.13: Kumpi tanu a inn dei sungah kham puan tualpi tawh kizem a, mel tuamtuam a nei puan tualpite silh a, mihon kigual deudaute lakah a kithuah pih nungakte le amah a khate tawh kumpipa kiangah kipaipih hi.
verses.15: Kumpipaʼ inn ah a tun ciangun lungdamna le nuamna tawh amaute kitumpih hi.
verses.16: Na pateʼ tang ding na tapate hong hi dinga, nangmah in leitung khempeuh ah amaute, ulian na suaksak ding hi.
verses.17: Keimah in khang tawntungin na min ka kiphawksak ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite in nang hong phat den ding uh hi.
